title: Wealth discovered: or, An essay upon a late expedient for taking away all impositions and raising a revenue without taxes. Published, and presented to his most excellent Majesty, King Charles the II. By F.C. a lover of his countrey. Whereunto is added his Majesties gracious order.
author: Cradocke, Francis, d. 1670?
publicationStmtPublisher: printed by E.C. for A. Seile over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,
